item.title: 2023-07-01 - 2023H2 Goals
item.description: Mini-Reflection on “Open-Diary” and the Past Failures Having goals is a good idea, and it’s even better to pursue them. Last year, around this time, I came up with the idea of an “open diary” concept. It allows people to keep an open diary as a review and share it like a blog post. I wrote my first post back then, and now it has been a year. However, I think that’s okay.

item.title: 2022-07-27 - Daily Progress
